'Jammer genoeg zien we steeds meer misbruik van het vrij verkeer van werknemers' #Benelux
'We kunnen says niet aanvaarden omdat says competing oneerlijke is voor eleven bedrijven, vaak familieondernemingen' #Benelux
'We kunnen says ook niet aanvaarden omdat deze werknemers worden uitgebuit amper social rechten genieten'
'Ik ben dan ook blij dat Nederland, Luxemburg en België samen een prioriteit maken van de strijd tegen deze social dumping' #Benelux
'We want to quickly implement or anticipate the implementation of the European Posting of Workers Directive'
'We will launch pilot projects on cross-border inspection of companies (transport, construction, etc.)'
'We will strengthen the collaboration of the inspection services of the 3 countries to better fight against abuses' #Benelux

CHP General Manager gave an interview to the newspaper operator. "Since the date of the establishment of Turkey, since 1071, his face has turned to civilization," he says.
Was Turkey established in 1071? At the beginning of the CHP there is a general manager who thinks Turkey is founded in 1071.
History and geography knowledge of CHP is zero, religious culture and moral knowledge is zero, and political knowledge is already zero. Ignorance knees.
One of the most difficult times yesterday, 'Headscarf is füruattır, teferruattır' he said. Today, they carry water to the mill of their headscarf enemies.
These are as disrespectful and immoral as to betray our beloved Prophet Muhammad, to mount and truck him.
